thread.title: nice clean hotel!
thread.title_full: nice clean hotel! - Review of Hampton Inn Manhattan-Chelsea, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: ashleymG8431KL
title: nice clean hotel!
text: stayed here with my husband and 2 children for the weekend. we were very pleased with everything! there was a great sized mini fridge in the room and view of the city. we got to choose our own room and free yummy breakfast! my only suggestion would be to put hooks on the back of the bathroom doors. great experience and I would go back!
